name: Labradorite and Sterling Silver Oval Ring
description:
A unique design.
Handmade in sterling silver, with a gorgeous flashing blue labradorite cabuchon. A great find on a gem hunting mission in Kathmandu!
A hand carved scalloped edge, oxidised and hand polished.
This ring is adjustable and will fit size 10 down to the smallest size. If you would like your ring sized please add in the note to seller. I can then gently hammer to shape with a rawhide mallet,(this doesn't mark the silver). Otherwise you can adjust yourself, there is plenty of length in each band to open out to fit the largest size and it wraps around to fit the smallest because the band is only attatched at one end.
The face of this ring measures 38mm / 1.5 inches x 27mm / 1 inch.

name: Blue Pearl and Labradorite Bracelet
description:
Gorgeous rainbow blue fresh water pearls, irreuglar shaped, look juicy wwith the faceted labradorites, flashing blue and looking great. A few tiny silver beads in there too.
Threaded onto soft flexi wire,(silver plated). I like thie wire because it has a slinky feel that lets the bracelet move in a gentle way.
The ends are tightly wire wrapped with silver to secure the flexi thread, and finished with a handmade sterling silver clasp.and finished with a handmade sterling silver.
The pearls measure 10mm and the labradorites are 11 and 8mm.
This bracelet measures 8 inches/23cm.

name: Labradorite and Sterling Silver Ring
description:
Handmade sterling silver and labradorite ring. A soft square shape ring with a plain border.This stone has a gorgeous gold and blue flash.
The photo was taken in bright sunlight to bring out the full colour of the stone!
The stone was handpicked on a gem finding mission in India!
This is an adjustable ring, though at the moment it is quite large(US 9) See the picture of the back of the ring to see how the band is attatched. Please contact me if you would like this ring sized.
This ring can also be oxidised on request at no extra charge.
This ring measures 1 inch/2.5cm x 7/8 inch/22mm.

name: Turquoise and Sterling Silver Ring
description:
Unique handmade sterling silver and asymmetric turquoise ring.
A lovely stabilised natural coloured turquoise cabuchon.
Set in a plain border, so the focus is on the gorgeous stone.
The silver has been oxidised and burnished.
This ring is adjustable and will fit size 12 - 0. If you would like your ring sized please add in the note to seller. I can then gently hammer to shape with a rawhide mallet,(this doesn't mark the silver). Otherwise you can adjust yourself, there is plenty of length in each band to open out to fit the largest size and it wraps around to fit the smallest because the band is only attatched at one end.
The band is D shaped and 4mm depth.
The stone is 1 1/4 inches - 3cm x 3/4 inch - 2cm.

name: Turquoise Pendant Necklace
description:
Rustic style handmade turquoise and sterling silver pendant necklace.The reverse of the pendant has a hand cut lotus flower design.The silver has been oxidised and burnished by hand for a matt look finish.
   The main stone is a beautiful greenish turquoise cabuchon. The theme continues with Tibetan heishi beads and a few fine silver beads threaded onto sterling silver wire and a delicate chain.
   The whole necklace meaures 11 inches, the chain length equals 18inches. The bezel set stone is a little over 1 inch.The heishi beads are 5/16 inch/8mm.
